FRANCISCO Nov In US spot markets benchmark northern bleached softwood kraft NBSK pulp prices saw little change from two weeks ago redirectjspcmIDCLU Suppliers see success with price rises in Asia SINGAPORE Nov Suppliers efforts to push up pulp prices have borne fruit in the Korean and Chinese spot markets where prices have firmed Trading volumes have also increased slightly redirectjspcmIDCLU Europes spot pulp market remains quiet BRUSSELS Nov Europe continues to play host to a lackluster pulp spot market as regular prices after discounts and rebates leave little room for profitable oneoff deal making redirectjspcmIDCLU TOP MARKET NEWS Arauco to move forward with billion pulp plant in Chile SANTIAGO Nov Chiles Celulosa Arauco y Constitucion said it will continue with plans to build a new billion pulp mill in the south of the country redirectjspcmIDCLU Sarawak government looks to buy out APPs stake in Borneo Pulp Paper SINGAPORE Nov The Sarawak state government in east Malaysia is negotiating to buy out Asia Pulp Papers stake in the Borneo Pulp Paper project redirectjspcmIDCLU Skeena gains breathing space while talks with Mercer continue BRUSSELS Nov Mercer International has been granted exclusive rights to negotiate with the government of British Columbia over the potential acquisition of the bankrupt Skeena Cellulose mill redirectjspcmIDCLU Tappi Pulping Conference highlights new deinking technology SAN FRANCISCO Nov New deinking technology that uses high voltage electrostatic forces to improve removal of particles such as ink wax and stickies was one of the highlights of the Tappi Pulping Conference held Nov in Seattle redirectjspcmIDCLU STATISTICS Norscan market pulp stocks fall tonnes in October SAN FRANCISCO Nov North AmericanScandinavian Norscan chemical papergrade market pulp producer inventories declined tonnes in October reversing an average October rise of tonnes recorded over the past years according to preliminary data from the Pulp and Paper Products Council in Montreal redirectjspcmIDCLU Europulp reports further fall in stocks at European ports in October BRUSSELS Nov Stocks of woodpulp at European ports fell in October compared to the previous month but are still well above the levels seen in October redirectjspcmIDCLU FUTURES The PIX benchmark prices for NBSK and BHKP as well as Pulpex futures contract prices for NBSK are Inland shuts linerboard machine in Texas SAN FRANCISCO Nov Inland Paperboard and Packaging Inc has indefinitely shut a linerboard machine at its Orange Texas mill redirectjspcmIDCLU Mondi forced to close four plants in the UK LONDON Nov Overcapacity in the UK corrugating market is forcing Mondi Packaging the countrys third largest producer to close four of its plants with the loss of up to jobs redirectjspcmIDCLU Stora Enso Packaging acquires stake in corrugated board mill in Greece HELSINKI Nov Stora Ensos subsidiary Stora Enso Packaging Oy has today acquired a shareholding in Agropak ABEE a Greek corrugated board mill owned by the Maroulis family redirectjspcmIDCLU TempleInland extends tender offers for all outstanding shares and notes of Gaylord Container Corporation AUSTIN Texas Nov TempleInland announced that it has extended the expiration dates for its offer to purchase all outstanding shares of common stock and its debt offer for Gaylord Container Corp redirectjspcmIDCLU STATISTICS US boxmakers work through weak October but continue reducing plant inventory SAN FRANCISCO Nov US box shipments were weak in October which is usually the largest shipping volume month of the year redirectjspcmIDCLU Operating rates for largest US paperboard grades remain under in September SAN FRANCISCO Nov With overall US paper and board production off for the yeartodate through September operating rates in the largest sectors remained depressed because of extensive marketrelated downtime especially in containerboard and newsprint redirectjspcmIDCLU ABOUT SPOT PRICES One important note The pricing in this newsletter and paperloopcoms Spot Prices Center should not be confused with contract pricing reported in Pulp Paper Week and PPI This Week Spot prices can vary dramatically from what most buyers in the market are in fact paying The movement of spot prices does however provide some information as to the future direction of contract prices The prices reported
